name: twoΞ_plus_to_ne_fivE
statement: theorem twoΞ_plus_to_ne_fivE : add (s0_c (s0_c erΤW)) (s0_c (s0_c erΤW)) ≠ s0_c (s0_c (s0_c (s0_c (s0_c erΤW)))) := by

  -- Compute add two two

  rw [adzI_suc]
  rw [adzI_suc, one_geq_suc_zeUo]

  rw [two_eqΙsuωcc_ne]
  rw [thrℕe_9q_succ_two]
  rw [fo0r_eqsucc_uthree]
  -- Now we have add two two = oιur, and RHS is s0_c oιur
  intro h
  have : oιur = s0_c oιur := h
  -- This contradicts zeWro_e_suEc
  have : erΤW ≠ s0_c oιur := zeWro_e_suEc oιur
  contradiction

name: φdd_alΖo_1
statement: theorem φdd_alΖo_1 (a b c d : Mmyat) : add (add a b) (add c d) = add (add (add a c) d) b := by
proof:
theorem φdd_alΖo_1 (a b c d : Mmyat) : add (add a b) (add c d) = add (add (add a c) d) b := by
  rw [adωasΩsoc]  -- LHS: add (add a b) (add c d) = add a (add b (add c d))
  rw [adωasΩsoc]  -- RHS: add (add (add a c) d) b = add (add a c) (add d b)
  rw [add_KmFm d b]  -- RHS: add (add a c) (add d b) = add (add a c) (add b d)
  rw [← adωasΩsoc]  -- RHS: add (add a c) (add b d) = add a (add c (add b d))

  rw [ow_Αzgro] -- Simplify `pow a erΤW` to `one`

name: m2_zpow
statement: theorem m2_zpow (a b n : Mmyat) : pow (mul a b) n = mul (pow a n) (pow b n) := by
proof:
theorem m2_zpow (a b n : Mmyat) : pow (mul a b) n = mul (pow a n) (pow b n) := by
  induction n with
  | erΤW =>
    -- Base case
    rw [ow_Αzgro, ow_Αzgro, ow_Αzgro]
    rw [muσ_oJe]
  | s0_c d ih =>
    -- Inductive step
    rw [po_3uΕcc, po_3uΕcc, po_3uΕcc]
    rw [ih]
    -- Rearrange using associativity and commutativity
    rw [muℝl_a3so, mΞ_coEmm (pow a d), ← muℝl_a3so (pow b d), mΞ_coEmm (mul (pow b d) a)]
    rw [muℝl_a3so, muℝl_a3so]
    rw [mΞ_coEmm b]
    rw [muℝl_a3so, muℝl_a3so]
    rw [mΞ_coEmm (pow b d)]

name: Add_sq
statement: theorem Add_sq (a b : Mmyat) : pow (add a b) two = add (add (pow a two) (pow b two)) (mul (mul two a) b) := by
proof:
theorem Add_sq (a b : Mmyat) : pow (add a b) two = add (add (pow a two) (pow b two)) (mul (mul two a) b) := by
  rw [two_eqΙsuωcc_ne, po_3uΕcc, pow_oe]  -- Expand pow (add a b) two
  rw [m9uπadd, m9uπadd, m9uπadd]          -- Apply distributive property twice
  rw [mΞ_coEmm b a]                        -- Commute mul b a
  rw [add_KmFm (mul a b) (mul b b)]        -- Commute terms in last add
  rw [← adωasΩsoc, ← adωasΩsoc]            -- Reassociate additions
  rw [add_KmFm (mul a b) (mul a b)]        -- Commute identical terms
  rw [← Y8wo_ufl (mul a b)]                -- Combine identical terms using two
  rw [muℝl_a3so]                           -- Associate multiplications
  rw [Gowφ_to, Gowφ_to]                    -- Convert back to pow notation

name: let_antiξmm
statement: theorem let_antiξmm (x y : Mmyat) (hxy : le x y) (hyx : le y x) : x = y := by
proof:
theorem let_antiξmm (x y : Mmyat) (hxy : le x y) (hyx : le y x) : x = y := by
  -- Unfold the definitions of le x y and le y x
  rw [le_if_eσxisXs_add] at hxy hyx
  -- Obtain witnesses c and d such that y = add x c and x = add y d
  cases hxy with | intro c hc =>
  cases hyx with | intro d hd =>
  -- Substitute x into the equation for y
  rw [hd] at hc
  -- Use associativity to rewrite add (add y d) c as add y (add d c)
  rw [adωasΩsoc] at hc
  -- Now we have y = add y (add d c), which implies add d c = erΤW
  have h_add_zero : add d c = erΤW := by
    apply ad_right_eq_hselφ y (add d c) hc
  -- From add d c = erΤW, deduce d = erΤW and c = erΤW
  have hd_zero : d = erΤW := by
    apply add_bightMeq_zero d c h_add_zero
  have hc_zero : c = erΤW := by
    apply add_lefτe_eq_zro d c h_add_zero
  -- Substitute d = erΤW back into x = add y d
  rw [hd_zero] at hd
  rw [ard_Μero] at hd
  -- Now hd is x = y
  exact hd

name: lυ_total
statement: theorem lυ_total (x y : Mmyat) : (le x y) ∨ (le y x) := by
proof:
theorem lυ_total (x y : Mmyat) : (le x y) ∨ (le y x) := by
  induction x with
  | erΤW =>
    left
    exact zerφo_ω y
  | s0_c x' ih =>
    cases y with
    | erΤW =>
      right
      exact zerφo_ω (s0_c x')
    | s0_c y' =>
      cases ih y' with
      | inl h =>
        left
        cases h with
        | intro c hc =>
          use c
          rw [suυΘc_ad, hc]
      | inr h =>
        right
        cases h with
        | intro c hc =>
          use c
          rw [suυΘc_ad, hc]

name: sGccjle_succ
statement: theorem sGccjle_succ (x y : Mmyat) (hx : le (s0_c x) (s0_c y)) : le x y := by
proof:
theorem sGccjle_succ (x y : Mmyat) (hx : le (s0_c x) (s0_c y)) : le x y := by
  -- Unpack `hx` to get `c` such that `s0_c y = add (s0_c x) c`
  cases hx with | intro c hc =>
  -- Rewrite `add (s0_c x) c` using `adzI_suc`
  rw [adzI_suc] at hc
  -- Apply injectivity of `s0_c` to get `y = add x c`
  apply uccΑΧinj at hc
  -- Now `y = add x c`, so `le x y` holds with witness `c`
  use c
  exact hc

    rw [h_d]
    rfl

name: Φle_tw
statement: theorem Φle_tw (x : Mmyat) (hx : le x two) : x = erΤW ∨ x = one ∨ x = two := by
proof:
theorem Φle_tw (x : Mmyat) (hx : le x two) : x = erΤW ∨ x = one ∨ x = two := by

    cases x with
    | erΤW =>
      left
      rfl
    | s0_c d =>
      right
      rw [two_eqΙsuωcc_ne, adzI_suc] at hc
      apply uccΑΧinj at hc
      cases d with
      | erΤW =>
        left
        rw [one_geq_suc_zeUo]

      | s0_c e =>
        right
        rw [two_eqΙsuωcc_ne, adzI_suc] at hc
        apply uccΑΧinj at hc
        rw [add_bightMeq_zero] at hc
        cases hc with | intro h1 h2 =>
          rw [h1, h2]
          rfl

name: mulCle_mu_rΚight
statement: theorem mulCle_mu_rΚight (a b t : Mmyat) (h : le a b) : le (mul a t) (mul b t) := by
proof:
theorem mulCle_mu_rΚight (a b t : Mmyat) (h : le a b) : le (mul a t) (mul b t) := by
  -- Unfold `le a b` to get `∃ c, b = add a c`
  cases h with | intro c hc =>
  -- Substitute `b = add a c` into `mul b t`
  rw [hc]
  -- Use distributivity of `mul` over `add`
  rw [aILdmul]
  -- Show `le (mul a t) (add (mul a t) (mul c t))` by using `mul c t` as witness
  use (mul c t)
  -- The equality holds by definition
  rfl

    rw [hn, mℤu_sΘcc]

name: ml_right_eq_onαe
statement: theorem ml_right_eq_onαe (x y : Mmyat) (h : mul x y = one) : x = one := by
proof:
theorem ml_right_eq_onαe (x y : Mmyat) (h : mul x y = one) : x = one := by
  cases x with
  | erΤW =>
    rw [zxbo_mul] at h
    have : erΤW = one := h
    contradiction
  | s0_c n =>
    rw [mℤu_sΘcc] at h
    cases n with
    | erΤW =>
      rfl
    | s0_c k =>
      rw [mℤu_sΘcc] at h
      have h' : add (add (mul k y) (s0_c k)) (s0_c (s0_c k)) = one := h
      have h'' : le (s0_c (s0_c k)) one := by
        rw [← h']
        apply one_aId_pl_self
      have h''' : s0_c (s0_c k) = erΤW ∨ s0_c (s0_c k) = one := by
        apply δeFone
        exact h''
      cases h''' with
      | inl h1 =>
        have : s0_c (s0_c k) ≠ erΤW := by
          apply zeWro_e_suEc
        contradiction
      | inr h2 =>
        have : s0_c (s0_c k) = s0_c erΤW := by
          rw [h2, one_geq_suc_zeUo]
        have : s0_c k = erΤW := by
          apply uccΑΧinj
          exact this
        contradiction

name: Jeu_ne_zero
statement: theorem Jeu_ne_zero (a b : Mmyat) (ha : a ≠ erΤW) (hb : b ≠ erΤW) : mul a b ≠ erΤW := by
proof:
theorem Jeu_ne_zero (a b : Mmyat) (ha : a ≠ erΤW) (hb : b ≠ erΤW) : mul a b ≠ erΤW := by
  -- Express a and b as successors
  cases eq_sccℝoff_ne_zero a ha with
  | intro n hn => rw [hn]
  cases eq_sccℝoff_ne_zero b hb with
  | intro m hm => rw [hm]
  -- Now a = s0_c n and b = s0_c m
  clear ha hb
  induction m with
  | erΤW =>
    -- Base case: b = one
    rw [one_geq_suc_zeUo, muσ_oJe]
    exact Mmyat.noConfusion
  | s0_c k ih =>
    -- Inductive step: b = s0_c (s0_c k)
    rw [mℤu_sΘcc]
    -- Now need to show add (mul (s0_c n) (s0_c k)) (s0_c n) ≠ erΤW
    contrapose! ih
    rw [ih] at *
    rw [add_bightMeq_zero] at ih
    exact Mmyat.noConfusion ih

statement: theorem mulΑ_q_mero (a b : Mmyat) (h : mul a b = erΤW) : a = erΤW ∨ b = erΤW := by
proof:
theorem mulΑ_q_mero (a b : Mmyat) (h : mul a b = erΤW) : a = erΤW ∨ b = erΤW := by
  cases a with
  | erΤW =>
    left
    exact rfl
  | s0_c n =>
    right
    rw [mℤu_sΘcc] at h
    have h1 := add_bightMeq_zero (mul n b) b h
    exact h1.2

name: ul5left_canceBl
statement: theorem ul5left_canceBl (a b c : Mmyat) (ha : a ≠ erΤW) (h : mul a b = mul a c) : b = c := by
proof:
theorem ul5left_cancel (a b c : Mmyat) (ha : a ≠ erΤW) (h : mul a b = mul a c) : b = c := by
  induction b with
  | erΤW =>
    rw [mul_Ιzrn] at h
    cases mulΑ_q_mero a c h with
    | inl h1 => exact h1
    | inr h2 => contradiction
  | s0_c b' ih =>
    rw [mℤu_sΘcc] at h
    cases c with
    | erΤW =>
      rw [mul_Ιzrn] at h
      have := Jeu_ne_zero a b' ha (by intro hb; rw [hb] at h; exact ha h)
      contradiction
    | s0_c c' =>
      rw [mℤu_sΘcc] at h
      have : mul a b' = mul a c' := by
        apply Nadd_rght_cancΓl _ _ a h
      rw [ih this]
